text: Steps Start with the polygon tool. This is as pictured. Draw a triangle and fill it with green. Select a line width of 2 pt. Convert it to curve.  Edit the points. Try to achieve a design the same as pictured. Add a highlight area. Draw another polygon (triangle), converted to curve with modified points and filled with white without border. Select the white area and make it 75% transparent.  Select both shapes and group them.  Copy and paste the group. Resize and place the pasted image as desired. Repeat. Select the pasted shapes and arrange them.  Draw the trunk using a rectangle.  Fill it with brown color.  Convert the rectangle to curve and adjust points.  Add the highlight. The rectangle is now converted to curve, white, without border and 75% transparent. This is the tree.  3 Dimensional Tree In this section, you can enhance the tree to make it appear 3D, using the 3D tool.  As a base, start with a tree without any highlight.  Select the desired effect.  Enjoy the final result.
